title: Bug 102436 - Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) is not being rejected correctly in the report design. The date value should have been validated by the UI or Model.
OB: An invalid date/time string is not being rejected correctly in the report design.
EB: The date value should have been validated by the UI or Model.
SR:
1. Open the report design interface.
2. Enter an invalid date/time string.
3. Verify if the input is rejected and an error message is displayed.
